Reviews.Title: Not even good for kids
Reviews.Author: Bob S
Reviews.Content: Invest in a better camera this is worthless. My 5 year old hates the quality of the pictures. A 5 year old can tell this is junk.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy .
Reviews.Author: hope winkowski
Reviews.Content: This camera is cheaply made and more along the lines of something you'd pick up at a Dollar Store. Not worth it

Reviews.Title: Worst Camera Ever
Reviews.Author: Latonya Ranelwilliams
Reviews.Content: This was a waste of money. Don't waste your time with this camera it is horrible. Not intuitive at all.

Reviews.Title: would not recommend
Reviews.Author: cindy
Reviews.Content: If I could rate this in the negative I would. -- I bought this for my 10 year old granddaughter so we may scap book things together.Ist -- the program will not work on my mac -- it is has the latest operating system but the system tells me the program is suspicious and is malware. therefore will not load. I then tried loading it on my pc laptop and it will not recognize  the program either.There is no one to call for help-- no manual came with it. I can get to a page to see the manual but cannot download or read it since you need to load the program first. Alos on the web site it stated A sd card coudl be use as an option..no way!! the is no place for an sd card. more money spent un wisely.DO NOT BUT THIS

Reviews.Title: The best thing Ever!!!
Reviews.Author: Samantha Staples I  absolutely love it
Reviews.Content: This is Awesome and was the Best thing Ever!!!I'm in love with this camera and can't get enough of it!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy to use
Shoots Video clips
Takes up to 152 photos
PC Webcam
ProductInfo.Name: Monster High Digital Camera
